name: OLLECT - Pair Matching Game
description:
OLLECT is a drag-and-drop based PAIR MATCHING GAME with challenging levels.

Find the matching images, place one on to the other. COLLECT all of the pairs before the time is over. Enjoy the nicest and richest image collection.

From the creators of ONNECT.

GAME FEATURES
Well-designed challenging levels
Arcade & leisure modes
Easy to play
Hint & grid boosters
In-game score bonus
Revive after fail
Autosave, continue playing where you left off.
Various image collections
Improves focus, attention, and concentration.


OLLECT is the most colorful and sparkling game among the FREE MATCHING GAMES, especially the ones that have PAIR MATCHING game mechanics. It can also serve as an ATTENTION TEST. Everyone of all ages can enjoy COLLECTING the pairs from the image stack.
developers: CHEF GAME STUDIO YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: CHEF GAME STUDIO YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI LIMITED SIRKETI
